description: This is a crude 1-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 5-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 20-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 100-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold propane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less propane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 1-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold butane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less butane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 5-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold butane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less butane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 20-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold butane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less butane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

This is a crude 100-gallon tank welded together from sheet metal, made to hold butane for use by stoves and other tools.  It can contain much less butane for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.
A small tank of butane, commonly used for camping stoves and torches.
A medium-sized tank of butane, commonly used for barbeques.
A large tank of butane, commonly used for heating.
A massive tank of butane, commonly used for heating a home or vehicle.
